member.name: T:Fizzler.Systems.HtmlAgilityPack.HtmlDocumentExtensions
member.summary: Extensions methods for .

member.name: M:Fizzler.Systems.HtmlAgilityPack.HtmlDocumentExtensions.LoadHtml2(HtmlAgilityPack.HtmlDocument,System.String)
member.summary: Same as but without the FORM nesting problem outlined in issue #24.
member.remarks: This method is designed to be used by the Fizzler project tools exclusively and may be removed from a future version.

member.name: M:Fizzler.Systems.HtmlAgilityPack.HtmlDocumentExtensions.Load2(HtmlAgilityPack.HtmlDocument,System.String)
member.summary: Same as but without the FORM nesting problem outlined in issue #24.
member.remarks: This method is designed to be used by the Fizzler project tools exclusively and may be removed from a future version.

member.name: M:Fizzler.Systems.HtmlAgilityPack.HtmlDocumentExtensions.LoadHtmlWithElementFlags(HtmlAgilityPack.HtmlDocument,System.String,System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.Collections.Generic.KeyValuePair{System.String,HtmlAgilityPack.HtmlElementFlag}})
member.summary: Parses the HTML and loads the document model using supplied per-element handling options.
member.remarks: The behavior of this method is not guaranteed to be thread-safe and is primarily a hack around being static.
This method is designed to be used by the Fizzler project tools exclusively and may be removed from a future version.

member.name: M:Fizzler.Systems.HtmlAgilityPack.HtmlDocumentExtensions.LoadWithElementFlags(HtmlAgilityPack.HtmlDocument,System.String,System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.Collections.Generic.KeyValuePair{System.String,HtmlAgilityPack.HtmlElementFlag}})
member.summary: Parses the HTML and loads the document model using supplied per-element handling options.
member.remarks: The behavior of this method is not guaranteed to be thread-safe and is primarily a hack around being static.
This method is designed to be used by the Fizzler project tools exclusively and may be removed from a future version.

member.name: T:Fizzler.Systems.HtmlAgilityPack.HtmlNodeExtensions
member.summary: HtmlNode extension methods.

member.name: M:Fizzler.Systems.HtmlAgilityPack.HtmlNodeExtensions.IsElement(HtmlAgilityPack.HtmlNode)
member.summary: Determines whether this node is an element or not.

member.name: M:Fizzler.Systems.HtmlAgilityPack.HtmlNodeExtensions.Elements(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{HtmlAgilityPack.HtmlNode})
member.summary: Returns a collection of elements from this collection.

member.name: M:Fizzler.Systems.HtmlAgilityPack.HtmlNodeExtensions.Children(HtmlAgilityPack.HtmlNode)
member.summary: Returns a collection of child nodes of this node.

member.name: M:Fizzler.Systems.HtmlAgilityPack.HtmlNodeExtensions.Elements(HtmlAgilityPack.HtmlNode)
member.summary: Returns a collection of child elements of this node.

member.name: M:Fizzler.Systems.HtmlAgilityPack.HtmlNodeExtensions.ElementsAfterSelf(HtmlAgilityPack.HtmlNode)
member.summary: Returns a collection of the sibling elements after this node.

member.name: M:Fizzler.Systems.HtmlAgilityPack.HtmlNodeExtensions.NodesAfterSelf(HtmlAgilityPack.HtmlNode)
member.summary: Returns a collection of the sibling nodes after this node.

member.name: M:Fizzler.Systems.HtmlAgilityPack.HtmlNodeExtensions.ElementsBeforeSelf(HtmlAgilityPack.HtmlNode)
member.summary: Returns a collection of the sibling elements before this node.

member.name: M:Fizzler.Systems.HtmlAgilityPack.HtmlNodeExtensions.NodesBeforeSelf(HtmlAgilityPack.HtmlNode)
member.summary: Returns a collection of the sibling nodes before this node.

member.name: M:Fizzler.Systems.HtmlAgilityPack.HtmlNodeExtensions.DescendantsAndSelf(HtmlAgilityPack.HtmlNode)
member.summary: Returns a collection of nodes that contains this element followed by all descendant nodes of this element.

member.name: M:Fizzler.Systems.HtmlAgilityPack.HtmlNodeExtensions.Descendants(HtmlAgilityPack.HtmlNode)
member.summary: Returns a collection of all descendant nodes of this element.

member.name: M:Fizzler.Systems.HtmlAgilityPack.HtmlNodeExtensions.GetBeginTagString(HtmlAgilityPack.HtmlNode)
member.summary: Returns a begin tag, including attributes, string representation of this element.

member.name: T:Fizzler.Systems.HtmlAgilityPack.HtmlNodeOps
member.summary: An implementation for from HtmlAgilityPack.

member.name: M:Fizzler.Systems.HtmlAgilityPack.HtmlNodeOps.Type(Fizzler.NamespacePrefix,System.String)
member.summary: Generates a type selector, which represents an instance of the element type in the document tree.

member.name: M:Fizzler.Systems.HtmlAgilityPack.HtmlNodeOps.Universal(Fizzler.NamespacePrefix)
member.summary: Generates a universal selector, any single element in the document tree in any namespace (including those without a namespace) if no default namespace has been specified for selectors.

member.name: M:Fizzler.Systems.HtmlAgilityPack.HtmlNodeOps.Id(System.String)
member.summary: Generates a ID selector, which represents an element instance that has an identifier that matches the identifier in the ID selector.

member.name: M:Fizzler.Systems.HtmlAgilityPack.HtmlNodeOps.Class(System.String)
member.summary: Generates a class selector, which is an alternative when representing the class attribute.

member.name: M:Fizzler.Systems.HtmlAgilityPack.HtmlNodeOps.AttributeExists(Fizzler.NamespacePrefix,System.String)
member.summary: Generates an attribute selector that represents an element with the given attribute whatever the values of the attribute.

member.name: M:Fizzler.Systems.HtmlAgilityPack.HtmlNodeOps.AttributeExact(Fizzler.NamespacePrefix,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Generates an attribute selector that represents an element with the given attribute and whose value is exactly .

member.name: M:Fizzler.Systems.HtmlAgilityPack.HtmlNodeOps.AttributeIncludes(Fizzler.NamespacePrefix,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Generates an attribute selector that represents an element with the given attribute and whose value is a whitespace-separated list of words, one of which is exactly .

member.name: M:Fizzler.Systems.HtmlAgilityPack.HtmlNodeOps.AttributeDashMatch(Fizzler.NamespacePrefix,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Generates an attribute selector that represents an element with the given attribute , its value either being exactly or beginning with immediately followed by "-" (U+002D).

member.name: M:Fizzler.Systems.HtmlAgilityPack.HtmlNodeOps.AttributePrefixMatch(Fizzler.NamespacePrefix,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Generates an attribute selector that represents an element with the attribute whose value begins with the prefix .

member.name: M:Fizzler.Systems.HtmlAgilityPack.HtmlNodeOps.AttributeSuffixMatch(Fizzler.NamespacePrefix,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Generates an attribute selector that represents an element with the attribute whose value ends with the suffix .

member.name: M:Fizzler.Systems.HtmlAgilityPack.HtmlNodeOps.AttributeSubstring(Fizzler.NamespacePrefix,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Generates an attribute selector that represents an element with the attribute whose value contains at least one instance of the substring .

member.name: M:Fizzler.Systems.HtmlAgilityPack.HtmlNodeOps.FirstChild
member.summary: Generates a pseudo-class selector, which represents an element that is the first child of some other element.

member.name: M:Fizzler.Systems.HtmlAgilityPack.HtmlNodeOps.LastChild
member.summary: Generates a pseudo-class selector, which represents an element that is the last child of some other element.

member.name: M:Fizzler.Systems.HtmlAgilityPack.HtmlNodeOps.NthChild(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Generates a pseudo-class selector, which represents an element that is the N-th child of some other element.

member.name: M:Fizzler.Systems.HtmlAgilityPack.HtmlNodeOps.OnlyChild
member.summary: Generates a pseudo-class selector, which represents an element that has a parent element and whose parent element has no other element children.

member.name: M:Fizzler.Systems.HtmlAgilityPack.HtmlNodeOps.Empty
member.summary: Generates a pseudo-class selector, which represents an element that has no children at all.

member.name: M:Fizzler.Systems.HtmlAgilityPack.HtmlNodeOps.Child
member.summary: Generates a combinator, which represents a childhood relationship between two elements.

member.name: M:Fizzler.Systems.HtmlAgilityPack.HtmlNodeOps.Descendant
member.summary: Generates a combinator, which represents a relationship between two elements where one element is an arbitrary descendant of some ancestor element.

member.name: M:Fizzler.Systems.HtmlAgilityPack.HtmlNodeOps.Adjacent
member.summary: Generates a combinator, which represents elements that share the same parent in the document tree and where the first element immediately precedes the second element.

member.name: M:Fizzler.Systems.HtmlAgilityPack.HtmlNodeOps.GeneralSibling
member.summary: Generates a combinator, which separates two sequences of simple selectors. The elements represented by the two sequences share the same parent in the document tree and the element represented by the first sequence precedes (not necessarily immediately) the element represented by the second one.

member.name: M:Fizzler.Systems.HtmlAgilityPack.HtmlNodeOps.NthLastChild(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Generates a pseudo-class selector, which represents an element that is the N-th child from bottom up of some other element.

member.name: T:Fizzler.Systems.HtmlAgilityPack.HtmlNodeSelection
member.summary: Selector API for .
member.remarks: For more information, see Selectors API.

member.name: M:Fizzler.Systems.HtmlAgilityPack.HtmlNodeSelection.QuerySelector(HtmlAgilityPack.HtmlNode,System.String)
member.summary: Similar to except it returns only the first element matching the supplied selector strings.

member.name: M:Fizzler.Systems.HtmlAgilityPack.HtmlNodeSelection.QuerySelectorAll(HtmlAgilityPack.HtmlNode,System.String)
member.summary: Retrieves all element nodes from descendants of the starting element node that match any selector within the supplied selector strings.

member.name: M:Fizzler.Systems.HtmlAgilityPack.HtmlNodeSelection.QuerySelectorAll(HtmlAgilityPack.HtmlNode,System.String,System.Func{System.String,System.Func{HtmlAgilityPack.HtmlNode,System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{HtmlAgilityPack.HtmlNode}}})
member.summary: Retrieves all element nodes from descendants of the starting element node that match any selector within the supplied selector strings. An additional parameter specifies a particular compiler to use for parsing and compiling the selector.
member.remarks: The can be null, in which case a default compiler is used. If the selector is to be used often, it is recommended to use a caching compiler such as the one supplied by .

member.name: M:Fizzler.Systems.HtmlAgilityPack.HtmlNodeSelection.Compile(System.String)
member.summary: Parses and compiles CSS selector text into run-time function.
member.remarks: Use this method to compile and reuse frequently used CSS selectors without parsing them each time.

member.name: M:Fizzler.Systems.HtmlAgilityPack.HtmlNodeSelection.CachableCompile(System.String)
member.summary: Compiles a selector. If the selector has been previously compiled then this method returns it rather than parsing and compiling the selector on each invocation.
member.remarks: The cache is per-thread and therefore thread-safe without lock contention.

member.name: M:Fizzler.Systems.HtmlAgilityPack.HtmlNodeSelection.CreateCachingCompiler
member.summary: Creates a caching selector compiler that uses a default cache strategy when the selector text is regarded as being orginally case-insensitive.

member.name: M:Fizzler.Systems.HtmlAgilityPack.HtmlNodeSelection.CreateCachingCompiler(System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary{System.String,System.Func{HtmlAgilityPack.HtmlNode,System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{HtmlAgilityPack.HtmlNode}}})
member.summary: Creates a caching selector compiler where the compiled selectors are maintained in a user-supplied instance.
member.remarks: If is null then this method uses a the implementation with an ordinally case-insensitive selectors text comparer.
